ModEntry.Name: good_subsistence+guns
ModEntry.Author: unknown
ModEntry.Description:
Good subsistence+guns mod that allows you to select 'None' on loadout screen for primary hip and secondary weapons. It also adds training rifle, honey bee and skull custom as selectable weapons.
After installing the mod, develop new weapons, then select them on loadout screen (at the end of the list).
Compatible with MGSV 1.10 (title screen).
Fulton can be disabled using script_loader. See https://unknown321.github.io/mgsv_research/weapons.html for more info on usage and configuration.
